subsection.name: Source files
subsection.P: This project differs slightly from the layout in typical Astrogrid projects. Usually, we place our source code in /src/java and our JUnit code in test/java. However, the layout for this project was generated automatically using the Maven goal

which puts the source code under src/java and the test code under src/test, with configuration files under /conf. Although this seems to be the layout favoured by Maven perhaps it would be better to stick to the uniform layout we have already? Comments?

section.name: Documentation
section.p:
Any xml documents placed in the xdocs folder are automatically processed into html when the site is built. Note the

tags surrounding the text - it's easy to forget these and wonder why your text hasn't rendered!

section.name: Navigation
section.p: A special file xdocs/navigation.xml can be added to place extra links on the left hand side and header of the page.
